settings.title: Ingredients
settings.message: All our ingredient-dense formulations are designed to simplify your skincare routine by supporting barrier function and reducing the packaging waste caused by product overconsumption. We focus on finding ingredients that are clinically proven to be efficacious, non-GMO, manufactured in Canada and produced from renewable resources. As part of our commitment to clean, we've applied for the prestigious EWG Certification.

settings.title: Packaging
settings.message:
Along with our commitment to reducing packaging waste through synergistic formulations, we've specially designed our packaging to be BPA free, 100% recyclable and Plastic Neutral. We aim to continue researching ways to both offset and reduce carbon production to go further and reach Plastic Negative.

Learn more about our dedication to sustainability.

settings.title: Our journey to sustainable
settings.message: As athletes, we enjoy the benefits of our environment with every run, ski and ride. We choose better quality gear from ethical manufacturers, drink from reusable containers and tread lightly when we train. We do this because we’re all trying to make positive changes for a more sustainable future. We acknowledge getting better is a journey, here’s what Lontreau is doing to get there.

settings.heading: Packaging Features
settings.message: Our serums are stability-tested and safely housed in 100% recyclable airless containers. Our unique packaging protects the ingredients from oxidization to ensure the longevity and integrity of every Lontreau product. Without springs, the mono-material technology allows the entire package to be recycled and keeps things lightweight so your kit can come with you, wherever you go.

settings.heading: No Fuss Formulations
settings.message: Our synergistic formulations are designed to simplify your skincare routine. Every step in the Lontreau Core Kit can be pumped directly into your hand, emulsified and applied all at once. Skip the multi-step routine and focus on the things that move you with Lontreau's science-backed formulas.

settings.title: Clean Journey
settings.message: We challenged ourselves to make products that are beyond clean and formulated according to the Credo Beauty “Clean” standard, which to date, is the strictest of the industry. We avoid over 2,700 specific ingredients and types of ingredients that are used in mainstream beauty products, but that Credo prohibits due to safety and/or sustainability reasons.

settings.title: EWG Certification
settings.message: Our products are EWG VERIFIED™, which recognizes that we meet EWG’s strictest standards for your health.

settings.title: Repurpose Global Plastic Negative Program
settings.message: We avoid plastic whenever possible — our boxes don’t have plastic film for a reason. When we can’t avoid plastic, we offset it through the repurpose program. Just like in our training, we don’t take any shortcuts and have committed to plastic negative not just plastic neutral.

settings.title: 1% for the Planet
settings.message: 1% for the Planet is a global movement inspiring businesses and individuals to support environmental solutions through annual memberships and everyday actions. We donate 1% of revenue to certified charities in the 1% community.
